EmailTemplate.textOnly:
- - - Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi Andrea, Just wanted to check in on this. Are you going to be doing cleared work for this client? If so, I need to reach out to the client and get a DD-254, please let me know when you have a moment. Thanks!Sara ___________________________________ SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> If you are in the DC area please check out our upcoming networking event! <http://events.r20.constantcontact.com/register/event?oeidk=a07e6cqaqtk0702919f&llr=kp5x6qkab> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: Sara Conde Sent: Monday, October 08, 2012 2:39 PM To: 'Andrea Michels' Subject: RE: FW: SOW for Andrea Michaels Hi Andrea, I did not know this was a cleared project? To be clear, we can only hold your clearance if we receive a DD-254 from the client which basically states the need for the clearance. If this project doesn’t require a clearance than we will just wait until you encounter one that does. Please review this document <http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Security_Clearance_Info_Sheet_Generic.pdf> and let me know if I should reach out to BRTRC for a DD-254 or if we will just wait until you do have work that requires a clearance. Thanks!Sara ___________________________________ SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> If you are in the DC area please check out our upcoming networking event! <http://events.r20.constantcontact.com/register/event?oeidk=a07e6cqaqtk0702919f&llr=kp5x6qkab> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: Andrea Michels [mailto:amichels.co@gmail.com] <mailto:[mailto:amichels.co@gmail.com]> Sent: Monday, October 08, 2012 11:02 AM To: Sara Conde Cc: Roger Yee Subject: Re: FW: SOW for Andrea Michels Sara,
I think we're good to go since the SOW states the rate. Roger may weigh in differently. Wait a few hours before executing to give him time to respond.
Thanks,
